articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: A helicopter on a rescue mission crashes on Tanzania's Mount Kilimanjaro, killing all 5 on board - ABC News
articles.description: Five people have died after a helicopter crashed on Africa’s highest mountain, Mount Kilimanjaro, in Tanzania
articles.content:
DAR ES SALAAM, Tanzania -- Five people have died after a helicopter crashed on Africas highest mountain, Mount Kilimanjaro, in Tanzania.
The accident Wednesday evening happened on one of the most po… [+1027 chars]
